name: 陳匡正
objective: Main proposes of this course are to let enrolled students understand international intellectual property organizations and treaties and make them understand these basic concepts and issues. Students will know new trends of international intellectual property law through teaching of this course and understand amendments of future Taiwan intellectual property legislation compared with international intellectual property laws and Taiwan intellectual property laws.
schedule:
Week 1 (109/3/2~109/3/7) Introduction: Research Scopes of International Intellectual Property Laws
Week 2 (109/3/9~109/3/14) International Intellectual Property Law Organizations (I): World Trade Organization and World Intellectual Property Organization
Week 3 (109/3/16~109/3/21) International Intellectual Property Law Organizations (II): International Union for the Protection of New Varieties of Plants and European Union; International Intellectual Property Treaties Related to Copyright (I): TRIPS Agreement
Week 4 (109/3/23~109/3/28) International Intellectual Property Treaties Related to Copyright (II): Berne Convention
Week 5 (109/3/30~109/4/4) Children’s Day
Week 6 (109/4/6~109/4/11) International Intellectual Property Treaties Related to Copyright (III): Rome Convention; International Intellectual Property Treaties Related to Patent (I): TRIPS Agreement
Week 7 (109/4/13~109/4/18) International Intellectual Property Treaties Related to Patent (II): TRIPS Agreement and Paris Convention
Week 8 (109/4/20~109/4/25) International Intellectual Property Treaties Related to Patent (III): Patent Cooperative Treaty and Patent Law Treaty
Week 9 (109/4/27~109/5/2) Holding Test for Technological and Vocational College
Week 10 (109/5/4~109/5/9) International Intellectual Property Treaties Related to Trademark (I): TRIPS (Trademark Rights and Geographical Indicators)
Week 11 (109/5/11~109/5/16) International Intellectual Property Treaties Related to Trademark (II): Paris Convention
Week 12 (109/5/18~109/5/23) International Intellectual Property Treaties Related to Trademark (III): Trademark Law Treaty, Singapore Treaty on the Law of Trademarks, Madrid Agreement Concerning the International Registration of Marks, Madrid Agreement Concerning the International Registration of Marks, and Lisbon Agreement for the Protection of Appellations of Origin and their International Registration
Week 13 (109/5/25~109/5/30) International Intellectual Property Treaties Related to Trademark (IV): Nice Agreement Concerning the International Classification of Goods and Services for the Purposes of the Registration of Marks, Vienna Agreement for Establishing an International Classification of the Figurative Elements of Marks; International Intellectual Property Treaties Related to Unfair Competition and Trade Secrets: TRIPS Agreement
Week 14 (109/6/1~109/6/6) International Intellectual Property Treaties Related to Plant Varieties: UPOV Convention
Week 15 (109/6/8~109/6/13) Conclusion
Week 16 (109/6/15~109/6/20) Final Project Report (I)
Week 17 (109/6/22~109/6/27) Dragon Boat Festival
Week 18 (109/6/29~109/7/4) Final Project Report (II)
